about_the_game:
Watch your back in the small peaceful town of Crystalpine Grove! This once criminal-free town is being haunted by numerous murders of young women. They believe it's the signature work of the infamous Rainman, a brutal slasher killer who mangles and drowns his victims.

Take control of our sweet and unsuspicious protagonist, Suzie. A young teenage girl working at the local forest road diner, just outside of Crystalpine Grove.
Little does she know, she may be next on the list of victims. Her outcome is in your hands, as there are seven different endings for you to explore.
Learn the various suspicious guests at the diner. The Rainman could be anyone... Anyone.
Beware the rain. When it rains... He hunts.

The Rainman features:

- Seven different endings. Some endings could reveal the identity of the killer. Others could end in your watery grave.

- Various characters to interact with. Lore rich dialogues will keep you on the edge of your seat and keep you guessing who the killer might be.

- A rich and atmospheric town set in the retro 1980s.

- Various easter eggs for you to find. Are you the real horror fan to find them all?

- Choices. Each choice you make will lead to another outcome.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are scenes that depict getting stabbed in the throat, getting shot and being drowned.
Overall classic slasher horror scenes with blood and violence.
There's one character smoking a cigar.
Also some characters have vulgar dialogues.
